Discover
Government-wide Objective

Ensure Law Enforcement Readiness

Updated Jan 2026

Objective focused on Ensure Law Enforcement Readiness.

Government Wide Objective

Programs

26
+10 from Jan 2020

Total Expenditure

$1.4B
+23% from Jan 2020

Key

Each bubble is a program sized by how much the program has spent in FY 2024 so far—as of Jan 2026

Insight

26 programs are working toward this objective, spending a combined $1.4B in FY 2024. The largest program is the Bulletproof Vest Partnership Program ($96.1M). The smallest is the Corrections Technical Assistance/Clearinghouse ($3.4M).
